title: Drawing, "Four Statues in Niches: Music, Architecture, Painting, and Sculpture; Study of Bacchus and Mercury", 1816
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: Musica euterpe; Architettura; Faenza; Bacco; 1816; pittura; scoltura
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Study of four statues in niches: music, architecture, painting and sculpture. Study of Bacchus with Hermes.
